column3: It was in quite and calm place
The beds were very comfortable and the shower was excellent. There was enough parking.
column4: The carpet had a stain and the breakfast wasn't what we'd expected. There was also some miscommunication when picking up our breakfast in the morning. That was a bit unfortunate.

column3: Quiet & clean as expected, good for parking

column4: Aircondition  not sufficient,  very warm in room

column3: No electrical sockets anywhere near the bed, no mini fridge, but very quiet, clean, good beds, pillows, blankets. Breakfast was good.

column4: A little out of the way but we knew that so not necessarily a complaint.

Not enough power sockets in the room. In fact there was only 1 which was far away from the bed. In this day and age there should be several power sockets for laptop, phone, tablet.
Also there was no desk.
